Name: Grand 'O'
Ingredients: 45 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: POUR soda water into ice-filled glass to half fill. ADD lemon juice, orange juice and Grand Marnier. TOP with soda.
Review: A fruity, zesty, light summery cocktail. Tip - pouring the soda first makes this refreshingly juicy drink easier to mix due to the specific gravities of the ingredients.
